TopicTitle: The Name Change Thread (WARNING! ONE TIME ONLY!)

Articles.Content:
Hey, I'd like to change my name to AlphaMensae, thanks.

It's my Twitch name, and I've been using it in other places as well, so it's time to change it here as well. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
can I change my name to Just ModerndayLink?

> 
> 
> 57 minutes ago, Laguna said:
> 
> 
> Hey, I'd like to change my name to AlphaMensae, thanks.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> It's my Twitch name, and I've been using it in other places as well, so it's time to change it here as well. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
> 

Changed.

> 
> 
> 49 minutes ago, ModerndayLink64 said:
> 
> 
> can I change my name to Just ModerndayLink?
> 

Also changed.
Hey, Sorry, Lord\_intet was meant to be Lord\_Inter ![:D](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/uploads/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")
I am quite (in)famous as **carmenara** on the BattleTech forums and would like this name here too :3
Done and done.
plot twist: you can change your name twice >:D

Can I change my name to 

HolidayTheLeek

I rarely use my current name anymore, and it would be nice for it to be changed.
Done, and actually, we probably should have asked you to change that one anyway. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

Hey, I'd like the underscore to be trimmed from my username please. Dunno why I started using the name with an underscore appended. ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif ":confused:")

> 
>

> 
> 
> Hey, I'd like the underscore to be trimmed from my username please. Dunno why I started using the name with an underscore appended. ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif ":confused:")
> 

Done.

>

> 
> 
> Done.
> 

Thankee greatly. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
